description.ko: 순수한 백색 에너지가 유리를 통해 활기찬 스펙트럼으로 부서지는 순간을 보여주는 광학 물리학의 탐구입니다.
description.en: An exploration of optical physics, showcasing the moment pure white energy shatters into a vibrant spectrum through glass.

prompt: Macro photography of a hyper-complex glass nautilus shell hit by a concentrated beam of white light. The shell explodes into a web of #FF0080, #00FF80, and #8000FF spectral shards. Intense light dispersion, #FFFF00 chromatic aberration, and rainbow caustics dancing on a dark reflective surface. 8k, raytracing, the chaotic beauty of pure light refraction.
